column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This was our first real deep dish pizza experience. We had the stuffed spinach bread - chewy and cheesy
column2: the "Lou" and the Malnati Chicago Classicâ„¢. Overall
column3: the bread was awesome but the pizza was OK. I was not a fan with the crust (very hard) and preferred the New York style thin crust. Later
